entities.name: horace slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn is introduced as he wears a ring that Dumbledore has never seen before. His eyes linger on the ring and he frowns momentarily.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as wearing a new ring that Slughorn notices. He is also referred to as questioning Slughorn about his precautions against intruders.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are mentioned as being the potential threat that Dumbledore and Slughorn are concerned about.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is concerned about Slughorn's precautions against intruders and suspects that the Death Eaters may be after him.
The Death Eaters are suspected to be recruiting Slughorn for their purposes of coercion, torture, and murder.
